title: Congrats, TooMuchSpareTime
content:
Note: To anyone offended by excessive language or somewhat graphic illustrations, please do not follow the link.

Artwork by one of the Commander Keen community is featured on Maddox's website!
[url=http://maddox.xmission.com/c.cgi?u=illustrator_results]maddox.xmission.com/c.cgi...or_results[/url]
(6th picture.)
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img]

title: ooh
content: Ooh, wow, that looks like a much more professional style than many of the Keen comics he put together--I wonder if his entire art style is changing, or if he just spent a lot of extra time on that?  It looks better than many of the political cartoons which appear in our newspapers here in the States!!

title: Re: ooh
content: ha! sweet... i like maddox so thats pretty sweet for TMST! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-disguised.gif[/img]

title: Re: ooh
content:
Mmmmm...raw talent. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: re:
content: I noticed that the other day too. Congratulations

title: Re: re:
content: Woah, that is nice stuff. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: re:
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]I wonder if his entire art style is changing, or if he just spent a lot of extra time on that? [hr][/quote]

Definetly the last thing. His Keen comics are obvious made very quick without an attemp to out details in it. I'm sure if he ever gets his Keen movie done that it will look familiar to his older stuff.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamba.nl/storage/view/upload/logo/image_multijpeg/DevilFrogVerwandlung.jpg[/img][img]http://www.jamster.com/s/jiw/img/US_logo_big.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Style
content: IMKO there is nothing wrong with the style in his Keen comics. I think it's great work, and definitely much better I could ever do.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Style
content:
Of course it's good stuff, I never denied that. And I could, if I really tried, draw most of his comics better and I don't mean that in an arrogant way because I know TMST is a far more better artist than I am.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamba.nl/storage/view/upload/logo/image_multijpeg/DevilFrogVerwandlung.jpg[/img][img]http://www.jamster.com/s/jiw/img/US_logo_big.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Re: Style
content: It probably looks better because it's hand-drawn, whereas his comics are done with a mouse. (If you look at the [url=http://tmst.twu.net/]Comicpage[/url], you'll see little difference in the art style from his other comics)
